hibernate-mapping.sql-query: SELECT EOCR.EOCR_CONSIGNEE_CODE, EOCR.EOCR_CONSIGNEE_NAME, EOCR.EOCR_TRANS_TYPE_CODE, EOCR.EOCR_TRANS_TYPE_NAME, EOCR.EOCR_PROVINCE_CODE, EOCR.EOCR_PROVINCE_NAME, EOCR.EOCR_CARRIER_CODE, EOCR.EOCR_CARRIER_NAME, EOCR.EOCR_STATUS, EOCR.EOCR_ID, EOCR.CREATOR, EOCR.CREATE_TIME, EOCR.MODIFIER, EOCR.MODIFY_TIME, EOCR.REC_STATUS, EOCR.REC_VER, ESUS.ESUS_USER_NAME_CN AS ESUS_USER_CREATOR_NAME, ESUSM.ESUS_USER_NAME_CN AS ESUS_USER_MODIFIER_NAME FROM EO_CARRIER_RULE EOCR LEFT JOIN ES_USER ESUS ON EOCR.CREATOR = ESUS.ESUS_ID LEFT JOIN ES_USER ESUSM ON EOCR.MODIFIER = ESUSM.ESUS_ID WHERE 1=1 <<AND EOCR.EOCR_CONSIGNEE_CODE LIKE :eocrConsigneeCode>> <<AND EOCR.EOCR_CONSIGNEE_NAME LIKE :eocrConsigneeName>> <<AND EOCR.EOCR_TRANS_TYPE_CODE LIKE :eocrTransTypeCode>> <<AND EOCR.EOCR_TRANS_TYPE_NAME LIKE :eocrTransTypeName>> <<AND EOCR.EOCR_PROVINCE_CODE LIKE :eocrProvinceCode>> <<AND EOCR.EOCR_PROVINCE_NAME LIKE :eocrProvinceName>> <<AND EOCR.EOCR_CARRIER_CODE LIKE :eocrCarrierCode>> <<AND EOCR.EOCR_CARRIER_NAME LIKE :eocrCarrierName>> <<AND EOCR.EOCR_STATUS LIKE :eocrStatus>> <<AND EOCR.EOCR_ID LIKE :eocrId>> <<AND EOCR.CREATOR LIKE :creator>> <<AND EOCR.CREATE_TIME > :createTimeFrom>> <<AND EOCR.CREATE_TIME <= :createTimeTo + 1>> <<AND EOCR.MODIFIER LIKE :modifier>> <<AND EOCR.MODIFY_TIME > :modifyTimeFrom>> <<AND EOCR.MODIFY_TIME <= :modifyTimeTo + 1>> <<AND EOCR.REC_STATUS LIKE :recStatus>> <<AND EOCR.REC_VER LIKE :recVer>>
